derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French chancellerie, from chancelier 'secretary' (see chancellor)

entry.def: A chancellery is the building where a chancellor has his offices.
The chancellery is the officials who work in a chancellor's office.

example.ex: He is a former head of the chancellery.
example.tran: 他以前是大臣官署的头儿。

means.word_mean: 1. a government building housing the office of a chancellor
